full_summary:
### Advance Exchange of Two (2) Honeywell SG-811 Symbol Generators
#### Solicitation Number: T8493-22-0015
#### Solicitation Status: Expired

Transport Canada is soliciting proposals for the advance exchange of two (2) Honeywell SG-811 Symbol Generators. The Contracting Authority for this requirement is Tanya Nadeau, who can be contacted at tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca or (343) 575-6684.

The period of the contract is from the date of contract award to March 31st, 2023 inclusively.

The solicitation is a request for proposal (RFP) under the competitive bidding process. Interested Suppliers may submit their proposals by 14:00 Eastern Time on March 8th, 2023.

Attachments and supporting documents for this solicitation can be found at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/23/73b953ba37d513250fffb15dffc41cb9/rfp_e_t8493-22-0015_01-17-23.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/23/73b953ba37d513250fffb15dffc41cb9/rfp_e_t8493-22-0015_01-17-23.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/23/f53f9451d2dcade3b2647982b535c02e/rfp_f_t8493-22-0015_01-17-23.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/23/f53f9451d2dcade3b2647982b535c02e/rfp_f_t8493-22-0015_01-17-23.pdf) (French).

### Key Summary:
- Service Requirement: The advance exchange of two (2) Honeywell SG-811 Symbol Generators.
- Trade Agreements: It is not expected that the total value of this requirement will reach the thresholds of the trade agreements.
- End Use: Transport Canada.

### Variables and Responses:
* NIBS Code: JX1680A - Miscellaneous Aircraft Accessories and Components - Repair and Overhaul
* UNSPSC
